code_value: Thinking back over the years, it seems that sweets used to be sweeter, girls used to be prettier, and people were in the habit of being nicer to each other than today. Or perhaps like many others, you have visited a place again after several years only to find that it is not what you expect it to be. The classrooms of your old school, which used to be quite big are now so small; the high fences that went on rising almost to the sky, are now no higher than others.
